feed.title: Apache APISIX® -- Cloud-Native API Gateway Blog
feed.subtitle: Apache APISIX® -- Cloud-Native API Gateway Blog

entry.title: Biweekly Report (Jun 1 - Jun 15)
entry.id: Biweekly Report (Jun 1 - Jun 15)
entry.summary: The Apache APISIX Community Weekly Report hopes to help community members better understand the weekly progress of the Apache APISIX community and and facilitate everyone to participate in the Apache APISIX community.

entry.title: Build automated operation platform based on Apache APISIX
entry.id: Build automated operation platform based on Apache APISIX
entry.summary: In this article, introduces how to implement an automated operation and maintenance platform based on Apache APISIX.

entry.title: Practice of localized application with API gateway in the Middle East
entry.id: Practice of localized application with API gateway in the Middle East
entry.summary: This article is based on the sharing made by Hu Lilin (Beeto Platform R&D) at the [Apache APISIX Summit ASIA 2022](https://apisix-summit.org/), and introduces how the Middle East social software Beeto uses APISIX to achieve localized deployment.

entry.title: Implementation of canary release solution based on Apache APISIX
entry.id: Implementation of canary release solution based on Apache APISIX
entry.summary: This article describes how Alibaba Cloud's microservice engine MSE is based on the flexible routing capabilities of Apache APISIX, cooperates with MSE's full-link grayscale capabilities, and achieves full-link grayscale through minimal configuration and code-free intrusion.

entry.title: Architecture evolution of investment platforms with API gateway
entry.id: Architecture evolution of investment platforms with API gateway
entry.summary: This article is compiled from the sharing at [Apache APISIX Summit ASIA 2022](https://apisix-summit.org/). It introduces how Xueqiu uses APISIX to achieve more flexible services in adjusting the active-active architecture.

entry.title: Installation and performance testing of API Gateway Apache APISIX on AWS Graviton3
entry.id: Installation and performance testing of API Gateway Apache APISIX on AWS Graviton3
entry.summary: Apache APISIX has carried out regression tests under the ARM64 platform, and fixed some compatibility issues of the build scripts under the ARM64 platform. Through a brief deployment test description, this article shows that in the AWS Graviton environment, both in terms of stability and traffic processing, APISIX's performance is very dazzling.

entry.title: Biweekly Report｜Explore the weeks of May 16th - May 31th
entry.id: Biweekly Report｜Explore the weeks of May 16th - May 31th
entry.summary: The Apache APISIX Community Weekly Report hopes to help community members better understand the weekly progress of the Apache APISIX community and and facilitate everyone to participate in the Apache APISIX community.

entry.title: Release Apache APISIX 2.14.1
entry.id: Release Apache APISIX 2.14.1
entry.summary: Exploratory release - Apache APISIX 2.14.1 is officially released. This release supports not only service discovery on the control plane, but also Istio, a WebSocket-based pubsub proxy framework, and an xRPC-based framework for managing non-HTTP layer 7 protocols.

entry.title: Biweekly Report (May 1 - May 15)
entry.id: Biweekly Report (May 1 - May 15)
entry.summary: The Apache APISIX Community Weekly Report hopes to help community members better understand the weekly progress of the Apache APISIX community and and facilitate everyone to participate in the Apache APISIX community.

entry.title: Biweekly Report (Apr 15 - Apr 30)
entry.id: Biweekly Report (Apr 15 - Apr 30)
entry.summary: The Apache APISIX Community Weekly Report hopes to help community members better understand the weekly progress of the Apache APISIX community and and facilitate everyone to participate in the Apache APISIX community.

entry.title: Interview with JU Zhiyuan: Becoming One of the 918 ASF Members, I Felt Thrilled and Proud
entry.id: Interview with JU Zhiyuan: Becoming One of the 918 ASF Members, I Felt Thrilled and Proud
entry.summary: In this interview, we invited JU Zhiyuan, a PMC member of Apache APISIX, to share his feeling about becoming an ASF member, his experience with open source, and his self-learning journey in technology.

entry.title: High Availability Configuration with TiDB and APISIX
entry.id: High Availability Configuration with TiDB and APISIX
entry.summary: In the TiDB Hackathon 2021, the APISIX team presented the ability of TiDB to interface with Apache APISIX to implement a universal configuration center. In this article, we will bring you some stories behind the project and the future outlook.

entry.title: The Vulnerability of Leaking Information in Error Response from jwt-auth Plugin（CVE-2022-29266）
entry.id: The Vulnerability of Leaking Information in Error Response from jwt-auth Plugin（CVE-2022-29266）
entry.summary: In APISIX 2.13.0 and previous versions, there is a problem of information leakage caused by the `jwt- auth` plugin.

entry.title: Biweekly Report (Apr 1 - Apr 14)
entry.id: Biweekly Report (Apr 1 - Apr 14)
entry.summary: The Apache APISIX Community Weekly Report hopes to help community members better understand the weekly progress of the Apache APISIX community and and facilitate everyone to participate in the Apache APISIX community.

entry.title: API Observability with APISIX Plugins
entry.id: API Observability with APISIX Plugins
entry.summary: In this blog post, we can leverage the power of some Apache APISIX Observability Plugins and take a look at how to set up these plugins, how to use them to understand API behavior, and later solve problems that impact our users.

entry.title: Apache APISIX Summit ASIA 2022: API Gateway, Service Mesh and Open Source Ecology
entry.id: Apache APISIX Summit ASIA 2022: API Gateway, Service Mesh and Open Source Ecology
entry.summary: The Apache APISIX community will organize the Apache APISIX Summit ASIA 2022 on May 20-21, 2022 via "Live Streaming".

entry.title: Apache APISIX 2.13.0 Is Released, Bringing LTS and New Features
entry.id: Apache APISIX 2.13.0 Is Released, Bringing LTS and New Features
entry.summary: Apache APISIX community has rolled out a new LTS version, 2.13.0. This version not only delivers more stable performance, but also supports more observability and service discovery plugins, as well as a more robust multilingual development system.

entry.title: Biweekly Report｜Explore the weeks of Mar 1st - Mar 14th
entry.id: Biweekly Report｜Explore the weeks of Mar 1st - Mar 14th
entry.summary: The Apache APISIX Community Weekly Report hopes to help community members better understand the weekly progress of the Apache APISIX community and and facilitate everyone to participate in the Apache APISIX community.

entry.title: Integrate API Gateway with Eureka
entry.id: Integrate API Gateway with Eureka
entry.summary: This article describes how to enable Eureka as a service discovery in the API gateway Apache APISIX and how to use diagnostic tools to find problems in the link.

entry.title: APISIX Integrates ClickHouse to Improve Log Efficiency
entry.id: APISIX Integrates ClickHouse to Improve Log Efficiency
entry.summary: The author of this article, Zhendong Qi, is from China Mobile Cloud Competence Center. He has extensive experience in distributed object storage software development and has participated in the construction of several resource pools in the mobile cloud. This article describes how community contributor Zhendong Qi contributed `clickhouse-logger` to Apache APISIX and how he used the plugin to simplify the business architecture and improve the efficiency of logging.

entry.title: Apache APISIX and CoreDNS open new doors for service discovery
entry.id: Apache APISIX and CoreDNS open new doors for service discovery
entry.summary: Apache APISIX is a dynamic, real-time, high-performance cloud-native API gateway that provides rich traffic management functions such as load balancing, dynamic upstream, grayscale publishing, service interruption, identity authentication, and observability. As a cloud native API gateway, Apache APISIX also integrates multiple service discovery capabilities. This article will show you how to configure CoreDNS in Apache APISIX.

entry.title: How to Use Gitpod to Develop API Gateway?
entry.id: How to Use Gitpod to Develop API Gateway?
entry.summary: This article introduces the open source cloud IDE product - Gitpod, and demonstrates how to use Gitpod to develop API gateway Apache APISIX and solutions to common problems.

entry.title: Biweekly Report｜Explore the week of Feb 15 - Feb 28
entry.id: Biweekly Report｜Explore the week of Feb 15 - Feb 28
entry.summary: The Apache APISIX Community Weekly Report hopes to help community members better understand the weekly progress of the Apache APISIX community and and facilitate everyone to participate in the Apache APISIX community.

entry.title: Use GraphQL with API Gateway Apache APISIX
entry.id: Use GraphQL with API Gateway Apache APISIX
entry.summary: This article introduces the features of Apache APISIX and GraphQL, and how to use the API gateway Apache APISIX to proxy GraphQL requests, and proposes solutions to solve the pain points of practical scenarios.

entry.title: Implement Traffic Governance in Internet Insurance with APISIX
entry.id: Implement Traffic Governance in Internet Insurance with APISIX
entry.summary: In this article, we will introduce some business scenarios and practical cases of zhongan and bring you the gateway selection and implementation operation under the "Internet Insurance" scenario.

entry.title: API Gateway Apache APISIX provides enhancements on API Management
entry.id: API Gateway Apache APISIX provides enhancements on API Management
entry.summary: This article introduces the principle and usage of API gateway Apache APISIX native plugin `public-api`.

entry.title: Upgrade of observability capabilities, API Gateway Apache APISIX integrates OpenTelemetry
entry.id: Upgrade of observability capabilities, API Gateway Apache APISIX integrates OpenTelemetry
entry.summary: This article introduces you to the Apache APISIX `opentelemetry` plugin concept and how to enable and deploy the `opentelemetry` plugin.

entry.title: How to Integrate API Gateway and Consul?
entry.id: How to Integrate API Gateway and Consul?
entry.summary: Apache APISIX supports the Consul KV-based service discovery registry. This article will walk you through the process of implementing service discovery and service registry in Apache APISIX.

entry.title: API Gateway Enhances Security by CSRF Plugin
entry.id: API Gateway Enhances Security by CSRF Plugin
entry.summary: This article introduces `csrf`, the CSRF security plugin for API Gateway, and details how to secure your API information in Apache APISIX with the help of the `csrf` plugin.

entry.title: The practice of Nacos service discovery on API Gateway
entry.id: The practice of Nacos service discovery on API Gateway
entry.summary: This article introduces the basic concepts of Apache APISIX and Service Registry, and shows you the practice of Nacos service discovery on API Gateway.

entry.title: Biweekly Report (Feb 1 - Feb 14)
entry.id: Biweekly Report (Feb 1 - Feb 14)
entry.summary: The Apache APISIX Community Weekly Report hopes to help community members better understand the weekly progress of the Apache APISIX community and and facilitate everyone to participate in the Apache APISIX community.

entry.title: file logger practice in API Gateway
entry.id: file logger practice in API Gateway
entry.summary: This article documents the process of developing the `file-logger` plugin by a front-end engineer with no back-end experience.

entry.title: Apache APISIX Vulnerability for Rewriting X-REAL-IP Header (CVE-2022-24112)
entry.id: Apache APISIX Vulnerability for Rewriting X-REAL-IP Header (CVE-2022-24112)
entry.summary: In versions prior to Apache APISIX 2.12.1, there is a risk of rewriting X-REAL-IP header after enabling the Apache APISIX `batch- requests` plug-in. Now the processing information will be announced.

entry.title: Integrating Splunk HTTP Event Collector with API Gateway
entry.id: Integrating Splunk HTTP Event Collector with API Gateway
entry.summary: This article explains how to configure and use the Splunk HEC service in Cloud-native API Gateway Apache APISIX.

entry.title: forward-auth Plugin for Authentication Function
entry.id: forward-auth Plugin for Authentication Function
entry.summary: This article describes the use of `forward-auth`, a new plugin in Apache APISIX, and provides detailed instructions on how to use this cleanly designed authentication model.

entry.title: Integrate Apache APISIX with gRPC-Web
entry.id: Integrate Apache APISIX with gRPC-Web
entry.summary: Apache APISIX already supports gRPC protocol proxies, as well as HTTP(s) to gRPC Server proxies via the gRPC Transcode plugin. Through active community discussion and contributions, Apache APISIX has broadened the scope of support for the gRPC ecosystem, support for the gRPC Web Protocol Request Proxy.

entry.title: Apache APISIX 2.12.0 is Released, More Features Coming！
entry.id: Apache APISIX 2.12.0 is Released, More Features Coming！
entry.summary: Following the release of version 2.11.0, Apache APISIX will also bring you the first version with new features in 2022 during the upcoming Spring Festival.

entry.title: Webinar | APISIX in QingCloud!
entry.id: Webinar | APISIX in QingCloud!
entry.summary: On January 28th, the Apache APISIX community is joining forces with QingCloud to bring you an online sharing session.

entry.title: HashiCorp Vault Secure Storage Backend in Apache APISIX Ecosystem
entry.id: HashiCorp Vault Secure Storage Backend in Apache APISIX Ecosystem
entry.summary: This article brings you the upcoming release of the Vault-Apache APISIX integration and related details.

entry.title: Get More Details About xRPC
entry.id: Get More Details About xRPC
entry.summary: This article brings you Apache APISIX's upcoming xRPC framework and related details, as well as a detailed presentation of Apache APISIX in multi-language development support.

entry.title: The Practice of Public Gateway in CDN Scenario from UPYUN
entry.id: The Practice of Public Gateway in CDN Scenario from UPYUN
entry.summary: In the previous sharing, we brought you the application of cloud at the Ingress level. This time, we will introduce you to the current cloud application examples under the public network gateway scenario, hoping to bring you some practical Apache APISIX scenarios to share in the cloud storage industry.

entry.title: Biweekly Report (Jan 1 - Jan 16)
entry.id: Biweekly Report (Jan 1 - Jan 16)
entry.summary: The Apache APISIX Community Weekly Report hopes to help community members better understand the weekly progress of the Apache APISIX community and and facilitate everyone to participate in the Apache APISIX community.

entry.title: APISIX integrate with Kafka for real-time log monitoring
entry.id: APISIX integrate with Kafka for real-time log monitoring
entry.summary: Apache APISIX has been providing support for Apache Kafka since version 1.2 with the kafka-logger plugin release. kafka-logger has been enhanced several times since then to provide very mature and complete functionality. It supports pushing API request logs, request bodies, and response bodies, to a Kafka cluster in JSON format.

entry.title: Makes it More Convenient for You to Proxy Dubbo Services in Apache APISIX
entry.id: Makes it More Convenient for You to Proxy Dubbo Services in Apache APISIX
entry.summary: In this article, we introduced how to use Apache APISIX to implement a proxy for Dubbo Service. By introducing the dubbo-proxy plugin, you can build a simpler and more efficient traffic link for the back-end system of Dubbo framework.

entry.title: Webinar | From API to Database
entry.id: Webinar | From API to Database
entry.summary: On January 15th, the Apache APISIX community is joining forces with the Apache Shardingsphere community to bring you an online sharing session.

entry.title: How to build APISIX in ARM Ubuntu
entry.id: How to build APISIX in ARM Ubuntu
entry.summary: By reading this article, you will learn how to build Apache APISIX (M1 chip environment) in ARM Ubuntu from source code.

entry.title: Biweekly Report (Dec 16 - Dec 31)
entry.id: Biweekly Report (Dec 16 - Dec 31)
entry.summary: The Apache APISIX Community Weekly Report hopes to help community members better understand the weekly progress of the Apache APISIX community and and facilitate everyone to participate in the Apache APISIX community.

entry.title: Use APISIX and Authing to implement centralized authentication Management
entry.id: Use APISIX and Authing to implement centralized authentication Management
entry.summary: This article describes the detailed steps for interfacing Apache APISIX and Authing.

entry.title: Use API gateway to proxy gRPC service
entry.id: Use API gateway to proxy gRPC service
entry.summary: This article shows you how to proxy client HTTP traffic to the back-end gRPC service via the `grpc-transcode` plugin in Apache APISIX.

entry.title: Apache APISIX Dashboard Unauthorized Access Vulnerability Announcement (CVE-2021-45232)
entry.id: Apache APISIX Dashboard Unauthorized Access Vulnerability Announcement (CVE-2021-45232)
entry.summary: There is a security vulnerability of unauthorized access in Apache APISIX Dashboard 2.7-2.10, and the processing information will be announced.

entry.title: Coming soon! Apache APISIX Integrate with Apache OpenWhisk
entry.id: Coming soon! Apache APISIX Integrate with Apache OpenWhisk
entry.summary: This article introduces the feature prospect and usage steps of the `openwhisk` plug-in, which is combined with a variety of identity authentication plug-ins provided by Apache APISIX to achieve authentication and authorization and other functions.

entry.title: Apache APISIX integrates with Open Policy Agent
entry.id: Apache APISIX integrates with Open Policy Agent
entry.summary: This article introduces the opa plug-in as an example of HTTP API and details how to integrate Apache APISIX with OPA to decouple the authentication authorization of back-end services.

entry.title: APISIX Integrates with Google Cloud Logging
entry.id: APISIX Integrates with Google Cloud Logging
entry.summary: This article will explain how to configure and use the Google Cloud Logging service in Apache APISIX.

entry.title: Biweekly Report (Dec 1 - Dec 15)
entry.id: Biweekly Report (Dec 1 - Dec 15)
entry.summary: The Apache APISIX Community Weekly Report hopes to help community members better understand the weekly progress of the Apache APISIX community and and facilitate everyone to participate in the Apache APISIX community.

entry.title: Secure Exposure of Istio Services with APISIX Ingress
entry.id: Secure Exposure of Istio Services with APISIX Ingress
entry.summary: This article shows you step by step how to use Istio Service Mesh and Apache APISIX, to expose services in a Service Mesh-enabled Kubernetes cluster to the outside of the cluster through very detailed steps.

entry.title: Webinar | Apache APISIX × Apache RocketMQ Online Meetup
entry.id: Webinar | Apache APISIX × Apache RocketMQ Online Meetup
entry.summary: On December 26th, the Apache APISIX community is joining forces with the Apache RocketMQ community to bring you an online sharing session.

entry.title: How to Easily Deploy Apache APISIX in Kubernetes
entry.id: How to Easily Deploy Apache APISIX in Kubernetes
entry.summary: Apache APISIX currently supports multiple ways to install and deploy. This article focuses on how to deploy Apache APISIX and APISIX-Dashboard in a Kubernetes environment.

entry.title: Monitor APISIX Ingress Controller with Prometheus
entry.id: Monitor APISIX Ingress Controller with Prometheus
entry.summary: This article introduces the relevant steps of how to use Prometheus to monitor APISIX Ingress Controller and the display effect of some indicators.

entry.title: How to Integrate Keycloak for Authentication with Apache APISIX
entry.id: How to Integrate Keycloak for Authentication with Apache APISIX
entry.summary: This article shows you how to use OpenID-Connect protocol and Keycloak for identity authentication in Apache APISIX through detailed steps.

entry.title: Apache APISIX & RocketMQ Help API Log Monitoring Capabilities
entry.id: Apache APISIX & RocketMQ Help API Log Monitoring Capabilities
entry.summary: This article will introduce the latest integration of Apache APISIX and Apache RocketMQ rocketmq-logger plug-in features and use. With this plug-in, you can connect to the RocketMQ cluster more easily when using Apache APISIX.

entry.title: Apache APISIX Integrates with SkyWalking to Create a Full Range of Log Processing
entry.id: Apache APISIX Integrates with SkyWalking to Create a Full Range of Log Processing
entry.summary: This paper mainly introduces two Apache APISIX integrated SkyWalking log plug-ins to provide a more convenient operation and environment for log processing in Apache APISIX.

entry.title: Biweekly Report｜11.15-11.30 Feature Highlights Update in Progress
entry.id: Biweekly Report｜11.15-11.30 Feature Highlights Update in Progress
entry.summary: The Apache APISIX Community Weekly Report hopes to help community members better understand the weekly progress of the Apache APISIX community and and facilitate everyone to participate in the Apache APISIX community.

entry.title: Apache APISIX's integration with Azure Serverless
entry.id: Apache APISIX's integration with Azure Serverless
entry.summary: This article talks about the recent addition of a new plugin `azure-functions`, and gives detailed instructions on how to integrate Azure Functions, which is a widely used serverless solution, into the Apache APISIX serverless suite.

entry.title: Apache APISIX 2.11.0 is officially released with more new features
entry.id: Apache APISIX 2.11.0 is officially released with more new features
entry.summary: Apache APISIX 2.11.0 is officially released, which is the first version with new features after 2.10.0 LTS.

entry.title: Using Apache APISIX Ingress Gateway to access Custom Monitoring in KubeSphere
entry.id: Using Apache APISIX Ingress Gateway to access Custom Monitoring in KubeSphere
entry.summary: This article will take Apache APISIX Ingress Controller as an example to show you in detail how to quickly use different types of gateways and status monitoring for Kubernetes clusters through KubeSphere.

entry.title: Contributer to Committer journey @Apache APISIX
entry.id: Contributer to Committer journey @Apache APISIX
entry.summary: In this article, Shivam Singh ([@1502shivam-singh](https://github.com/1502shivam-singh)) gives a brief of his journey from starting out in the Apache APISIX community, from a contributor to an Apache member and APISIX committer. His journey can help other people looking to startup in the Apache APISIX community or Open Source in general.

entry.title: APISIX request_uri variable with risk of path penetration
entry.id: APISIX request_uri variable with risk of path penetration
entry.summary: Research report about Apache APISIX Path traversal in request_uri variable(CVE-2021-43557)

entry.title: Apache APISIX Path traversal in request_uri variable(CVE-2021-43557)
entry.id: Apache APISIX Path traversal in request_uri variable(CVE-2021-43557)
entry.summary: In versions prior to Apache APISIX 2.10.2, there was a problem of "bypassing partial restrictions" that caused the risk of path penetration by using the $request_uri variable in Apache APISIX Ingress Controller.

entry.title: Develop APISIX Ingress Controller with Nocalhost in K8s
entry.id: Develop APISIX Ingress Controller with Nocalhost in K8s
entry.summary: This article walks you through using Nocalhost to seamlessly connect your local development machine to a remote Kubernetes cluster, allowing you to use IDE to develop and debug Apache APISIX Ingress Controller. Giving you the ability to comfortably develop and debug your remote apps with your existing skills.

entry.title: Apache APISIX embraces the WASM ecosystem
entry.id: Apache APISIX embraces the WASM ecosystem
entry.summary: Support for WASM will be added in the upcoming Apache APISIX version (2.11.0)! By reading this article you will learn how Apache APISIX deploys the support and development of this feature from 0 to 1.

entry.title: How to integrate with Dapr to build Apache APISIX Gateway Controller
entry.id: How to integrate with Dapr to build Apache APISIX Gateway Controller
entry.summary: This article will show you how to create an Apache APISIX controller by integrating Dapr, includes the concept of the project and the specific operation steps.

entry.title: Weekly Report (Sep 1 - Sep 14)
entry.id: Weekly Report (Sep 1 - Sep 14)
entry.summary: The Apache APISIX Community Weekly Report hopes to help community members better understand the weekly progress of the Apache APISIX community and and facilitate everyone to participate in the Apache APISIX community.

entry.title: Cloud Monitoring with Datadog in Apache APISIX
entry.id: Cloud Monitoring with Datadog in Apache APISIX
entry.summary: Apache APISIX recently released a new plugin APISIX-Datadog, to provide a deeper integration with Datadog. This article introduces the APISIX-Datadog Plugin and its capabilities.

entry.title: The observability of Apache APISIX
entry.id: The observability of Apache APISIX
entry.summary: This article introduces the observability capabilities of Apache APISIX and how to improve the observability capabilities of Apache APISIX through Apache SkyWalking.

entry.title: API Gateway Practice in Airwallex with APISIX
entry.id: API Gateway Practice in Airwallex with APISIX
entry.summary: This article will bring you about how Airwallex uses Apache APISIX for gateway layer deployment to strengthen the construction of data sovereignty.

entry.title: Weekly Report｜10.15-10.31 Feature Highlights Update in Progress
entry.id: Weekly Report｜10.15-10.31 Feature Highlights Update in Progress
entry.summary: The Apache APISIX Community Weekly Report hopes to help community members better understand the weekly progress of the Apache APISIX community and and facilitate everyone to participate in the Apache APISIX community.

entry.title: Apache APISIX Extensions Guide
entry.id: 2021/10/29/extension-guide
entry.summary: This article provides an extension guide for Apache APISIX, aiming to provide users with some ideas for extending Apache APISIX.

entry.title: How APISIX Ingress grown from 0 to 1
entry.id: 2021/10/26/apisix-ingress
entry.summary: This article describes the growth of APISIX Ingress and the details of the enhancements and community help that APISIX Ingress has received since joining the community.

entry.title: Use Cert Manager to manage certificates in Apache APISIX Ingress Controller
entry.id: Use Cert Manager to manage certificates in Apache APISIX Ingress Controller
entry.summary: This article shows how to create a certificate and pair it with Apache APISIX Ingress Controller via the Cert Manager.

entry.title: Webinar | Apache APISIX × Apache SkyWalking Online Meetup
entry.id: Webinar | Apache APISIX × Apache SkyWalking Online Meetup
entry.summary: On October 23rd, the Apache APISIX community is joining forces with the Apache SkyWalking community to bring you an online sharing session.

entry.title: Bieekly Report (Oct 1 - Oct 14)
entry.id: Bieekly Report (Oct 1 - Oct 14)
entry.summary: The Apache APISIX Community Weekly Newsletter hopes to help community members better understand the weekly progress of the Apache APISIX community and facilitate your participation in the Apache APISIX community.

entry.title: New milestone for the Apache APISIX community - over 300 contributors worldwide!
entry.id: New milestone for the Apache APISIX community - over 300 contributors worldwide!
entry.summary: The Apache APISIX community has reached a new milestone, surpassing 300 contributors worldwide to projects related to Apache APISIX!

entry.title: A thoughtful tutorial to get started with Apache APISIX Ingress from concept to practice
entry.id: A thoughtful tutorial to get started with Apache APISIX Ingress from concept to practice
entry.summary: This article describes and explains Apache APISIX Ingress in detail from both theoretical and practical perspectives.

entry.title: Apache APISIX community members help openEuler release first innovation version
entry.id: 2021/10/01/openeuler
entry.summary: Zexuan Luo and Ming Wen from the Apache APISIX community did a lot of work in the first community innovation release of openEuler on September 30 (openEuler 21.09) to migrate OpenResty to run smoothly and efficiently on the Euler open source OS.

entry.title: Biweekly Report (Sep 13 - Sep 30)
entry.id: Biweekly Report (Sep 13 - Sep 30)
entry.summary: The Apache APISIX Community Weekly Newsletter hopes to help community members better understand the weekly progress of the Apache APISIX community and facilitate your participation in the Apache APISIX community.

entry.title: Release Apache APISIX 2.10.0
entry.id: Release Apache APISIX 2.10.0
entry.summary: Apache APISIX 2.10.0 is released! This is the first LTS release of Apache APISIX.

entry.title: WPS with Apache APISIX to create new API gateway experience
entry.id: 2021/09/28/wps-usercase
entry.summary: In this article, Zhang Qiang, head of SRE network in WPS, explains how WPS can use Apache APISIX to handle Mega QPS, and update and improve gateway practices based on Apache APISIX.

entry.title: Practice in UPYUN with APISIX Ingress
entry.id: Practice in UPYUN with APISIX Ingress
entry.summary: This article describes the update and adjustment of UPYUN's internal gateway architecture after you selected Apache Apisix Ingress, and shares some of the practice scenarios in use.

entry.title: Apache APISIX helps DIAN to facilitate cloud native solution
entry.id: Apache APISIX helps DIAN to facilitate cloud native solution
entry.summary: This article introduces the background and practice of using Apache APISIX to build the cloud native project in DIAN.

entry.title: Implementing Apache APISIX in Tencent Cloud TI-ONE Platform
entry.id: Implementing Apache APISIX in Tencent Cloud TI-ONE Platform
entry.summary: This article is a practical case of implementing Apache APISIX in Tencent Cloud’s production environment.

entry.title: BiWeekly Report (Aug 30 - Sep 15)
entry.id: BiWeekly Report (Aug 30 - Sep 15)
entry.summary: The Apache APISIX Community Weekly Newsletter hopes to help community members better understand the weekly progress of the Apache APISIX community and facilitate your participation in the Apache APISIX community.

entry.title: Youzanyun PaaS for comprehensive micro-service governance with APISX
entry.id: Youzanyun PaaS for comprehensive micro-service governance with APISX
entry.summary: This article focuses on the enterprise case of using Apache APISIX for PaaS platform with Youzanyun native platform and how to use Apache APISIX as a specific example of the product traffic gateway.

entry.title: How APISIX implemented in China Mobile Cloud
entry.id: How APISIX implemented in China Mobile Cloud
entry.summary: This article is compiled from a presentation given by Yanshan Chen from China Mobile Cloud Competence Center at ApacheCon 2021 Asia. By reading this article, you can learn how China Mobile Cloud is developing and improving and updating its products based on Apache APISIX to create a better mobile cloud object storage.

entry.title: How can I contribute to an open source project without writing code?
entry.id: 2021/09/09/how-to-contribute-to-an-openSource-without-coding
entry.summary: This article introduces many ways to contribute to open source projects without writing code. You can participate in open source projects by writing articles, making videos, sharing them externally, building local communities, and actively participating in community discussions.

entry.title: Centralized Authentication with Apache APISIX and Advanced Tricks
entry.id: Centralized Authentication with Apache APISIX and Advanced Tricks
entry.summary: This article introduces the authentication feature of Apache APISIX, in terms of importance and playful use, with detailed descriptions and details on its use.

entry.title: Based on Apache APISIX, iQIYI API Gateway Update and landing practice
entry.id: 2021/09/07/iqiyi-usercase
entry.summary: In this article, you can understand how iQIYI's technical team updates and integrates the company structure based on Apache APISIX gateway to create a brand-new gateway service.

entry.title: Python helps you develop Apache APISIX plugin
entry.id: 2021/09/06/python-helps-you-quickly-with-apache-apisix-development
entry.summary: The Java Plugin and Go Plugin languages have been supported in the community before the Apache APISIX Python Runner, and today Python Runner is now available, giving the community another option for developing plugins for Apache APISIX.

entry.title: Apache APISIX × KubeSphere: Providing a better gateway and K8S Ingress Controller
entry.id: 2021/08/31/apache-apisix-kubeSphere-a-better-gateway-and-k8s-ingress-controller
entry.summary: This article describes the direct deployment of Apache APISIX and APISIX Ingress Controller in KubeSphere using the official Apache APISIX Helm repository. And Apache APISIX can be used as a gateway or as a data plane for APISIX Ingress Controller to carry business traffic.

entry.title: Webinar｜ See you at the Apache APISIX Ingress Community Meeting on Wednesday at 2pm!
entry.id: 2021/08/30/ingress-meeting
entry.summary: Apache APISIX Ingress community meetings to establish a channel of communication with community users and developers and to help everyone understand the direction and development plans for Apache APISIX Ingress.

entry.title: Weekly Report (Aug 23 - Aug 29)
entry.id: Weekly Report (Aug 23 - Aug 29)
entry.summary: The Apache APISIX Community Weekly Newsletter hopes to help community members better understand the weekly progress of the Apache APISIX community and facilitate your participation in the Apache APISIX community.

entry.title: Release Apache APISIX 2.9
entry.id: Release Apache APISIX 2.9
entry.summary: Apache APISIX version 2.9 is released!

entry.title: Centralized authentication using the OpenID Connect plug-in for Apache APISIX
entry.id: 2021/08/25/using-the-apache-apisix-openid-connect-plugin-for-centralized-authentication
entry.summary: This article demonstrates the process of centralized Okta authentication using the Apache APISIX OpenID Connect Plugin. This article contains a conceptual introduction to Apache APISIX and Okta centralized authentication, showing the process of establishing centralized authentication from Okta directly in Apache APISIX. This centralized authentication approach reduces learning and maintenance costs for developers and provides a secure and streamlined user experience.

entry.title: Why Apache APISIX chose Nginx and Lua to build API Gateway
entry.id: 2021/08/25/why-apache-apisix-chose-nginx-and-lua
entry.summary: Yes, Lua is not a well-known language, and it is probably a long way from the most popular programming language. So why do Apache APISIX and other well-known gateways choose Lua?

entry.title: Apache APISIX Meetup in Shanghai
entry.id: Apache APISIX Meetup in Shanghai
entry.summary: Event Review: Apache APISIX Meetup Shanghai Topic Sharing and Video Review.

entry.title: ApacheCon Asia 2021
entry.id: 2021/08/23/apachecon-asia-2021
entry.summary: ApacheCon is the official global conference series of the Apache Software Foundation. Since 1998, ApacheCon has been attracting participants at all levels to explore the "technologies of tomorrow" across more than 350 Apache projects and their diverse communities. ApacheCon Asia 2021 was held online from August 6-8, 2021. The Apache APISIX community actively participated in this annual open source event, presenting a total of eight API/microservices technology-related topics. The content was rich.

entry.title: Apache APISIX 社区周报 ｜ 2021 8.16-8.22
entry.id: Apache APISIX 社区周报 ｜ 2021 8.16-8.22
entry.summary: “独行者速，众行者远”。Apache APISIX 社区周报希望可以帮助社区小伙伴们更好地掌握 Apache APISIX 社区的每周进展，方便大家参与到 Apache APISIX 社区中来。

entry.title: Apache APISIX Meetup in Shanghai, welcome to register!
entry.id: Apache APISIX Meetup in Shanghai, welcome to register!
entry.summary: This Meetup was initiated by api7.ai https://www.apiseven.com/, and invited partners such as iQiYi and Airwallex to present it. Apache APISIX PMC members, contributors, and community technical experts gathered to discuss Apache APISIX community development, industry practices, and other topics.

entry.title: How to use Go to develop Apache APISIX plugin
entry.id: 2021/08/19/go-makes-apache-apisix-better
entry.summary: This article will explain in detail how to use Go to develop Apache APISIX plugins. By embracing the Go ecosystem and breaking new ground for Apache APISIX, we hope that Go will make Apache APISIX even better!

entry.title: Apache APISIX 社区周报 ｜ 08-09 ～ 08-15
entry.id: Apache APISIX 社区周报 ｜ 08-09 ～ 08-15

entry.title: Licensing with Casbin in Apache APISIX
entry.id: 2021/08/18/auth-with-casbin-in-apache-apisix
entry.summary: When we are using Apache APISIX, we may want to add complex authorization logic to our application. In this article, we will use the built-in Casbin plugin (authz-casbin) of Apache APISIX to implement the role-based access control (RBAC) model.

entry.title: Interview with Yang to explore API gateway in Airwallex
entry.id: Interview with Yang to explore API gateway in Airwallex
entry.summary: In this article, we interviewed Airwallex Technical Platform Lead Yang Li, who is responsible for the evolution of the company's technology platform. In the interview, he introduced in detail why Airwallex chose Apache APISIX when making technology selection, the usage scenarios of Apache APISIX in Airwallex, and the performance of Apache APISIX in production environment.

entry.title: Using the Apache APISIX OpenID Connect Plugin for Okta Centralized Authentication
entry.id: 2021/08/16/using-the-apache-apisix-openid-connect-plugin-for-centralized-authentication
entry.summary: This blog shows the procedures of using Apache APISIX OpenID Connect Plugin for Okta Centralized Authentication. This blog contains conceptual introductions of Apache APISIX and Okta Centralized Authentication, and detailed step-by-step instructions.

entry.title: Contributors — The Golden Metric of OpenSource Projects
entry.id: 2021/08/14/contributors-the-golden-metric-of-opensource-projects
entry.summary: This article explains why changes in the number of contributors is the golden metric for measuring open source projects. While GitHub already has a number of metrics, such as Star count, Issue count, and PR count, none of these metrics can visually reflect the trends and activity of an open source project over time. So Yiyiyimu proposed new metrics, such as contributor growth and monthly active contributors, and created an open-source tool called the Contributor Graph that allows GitHub users to use these metrics to identify how active a project is. Currently, the Contributor Graph is used in many other used in open source projects.

entry.title: Chaos Mesh Helps Apache APISIX Improve System Stability
entry.id: 2021/08/12/chaos-mesh-helps-apache-apisix-improve-system-stability
entry.summary: This article explains how system stability create some pain points in different scenarios. Then it tells the stories of why the author chose Chaos Mesh as the ultimate solution,and how to use Chaos Mesh in Apache APISIX. In the end, there is also future plans for this solution, including run a chaos test in E2E simulation scenarios, add chaos tests to more Apache APISIX projects, and add features to Chaos Mesh.

entry.title: My first PR in the Apache APISIX community
entry.id: 2021/08/11/interview-tuzhengsong
entry.summary: This interview is about Zhengsong Tu's journey from an open source community nerd to an APISIX committer for Apache's top open source project. Zhengsong Tu (GitHub ID: tzssangglass) was elected as an Apache APISIX committer on July 22, 2021 for his deep involvement in Apache APISIX development and his many contributions to the community.

entry.title: APISIX Architecture: How to Dynamically Manage NGINX Cluster?
entry.id: APISIX Architecture: How to Dynamically Manage NGINX Cluster?
entry.summary: This article is re-posted from Tao Hui's personal blog, and introduces the principles of Apache APISIX based on APISIX version 2.8, OpenResty version 1.19.3.2, and Nginx version 1.19.3 to implement a REST API for remote control of Nginx clusters.

entry.title: Apache APISIX 在移动云的应用
entry.id: 2021/08/09/apache-apisix-in-china-mobile-cloud
entry.summary: 我们有幸采访了中国移动云能力中心的陈焱山，在采访中我们了解到中国移动公有云建设发展演进历程，了解了中国移动云为什么选择 Apache APISIX 作为负载均衡网关，并且知晓移动云后续的发展规划。

entry.title: Abandoning Kong and Nginx, Hyperchain Technology implements on its BaaS platform
entry.id: 2021/08/09/apache-apisix-in-quliankeji
entry.summary: This article introduces the landing practice of Apache APISIX in Hyperchain Blockchain BaaS platform, and explains why Hyperchain Technology has chosen Apache APISIX among many gateway applications.

entry.title: How to Improve the Observability of Nginx with Apache APISX
entry.id: How to Improve the Observability of Nginx with Apache APISX
entry.summary: Best Practices: This article shares solutions and practices for observability in the context of Nginx observability, the relationship between Apache APISIX and Nginx, Apache APISIX observability, and further enhancing observability with Apache SkyWalking.

entry.title: Kong-To-APISIX Migration Tool
entry.id: 2021/08/05/kong-to-apisix
entry.summary: Apache APISIX is a production-ready open source seven-layer full traffic processing platform that serves as an API gateway for business entry traffic with high performance, low latency, official dashboard support, and over fifty plugins. If you are using Kong and are interested in APISIX but struggle to get started, try our just open source migration tool Kong-To-APISIX to help you migrate smoothly with one click.

entry.title: Release Apache APISIX 2.8.0
entry.id: Release Apache APISIX 2.8.0
entry.summary: Apache APISIX version 2.8 is released!

entry.title: Apply Plugin Orchestration in Apache APISIX
entry.id: 2021/07/27/use-of-plugin-orchestration-in-apache-apisix
entry.summary: Read this article to learn about Apache APISIX and basic usage scenarios, and how Apache APISIX integrates "drag and drop" plugin orchestration capabilities in a low-code trend.

entry.title: ApacheCon Asia 2021: Apache APISIX Technical Topics
entry.id: ApacheCon Asia 2021: Apache APISIX Technical Topics
entry.summary: ApacheCon is the official global conference series of the Apache Software Foundation. Since 1998, ApacheCon has been attracting participants at all levels to explore "tomorrow's technologies" across more than 350 Apache projects and their diverse communities. ApacheCon Asia is the ApacheCon organizing committee's online conference for the Asia-Pacific region. ApacheCon Asia is an online ApacheCon conference organized by the ApacheCon organizing committee for the Asia-Pacific region with the primary goal of better serving the rapidly growing number of Apache users and contributors in the Asia-Pacific region. ApacheCon Asia 2021 will be held online from August 6-8 this year.

entry.title: Live | Apache APISIX x Kubernetes
entry.id: 2021/07/21/apache-apisix-kubernetes
entry.summary: Live Preview: On Friday, July 23rd, 2021 at 00:00 GMT, Apache APISIX committer Jintao Zhang will present "Run Apache APISIX in Kubernetes" at the Data on Kubernetes Community Meetup for global developers. The topic will be "Run Apache APISIX in Kubernetes".

entry.title: The Road to Customized Development of Sina Weibo API Gateway
entry.id: 2021/07/06/the-road-to-customization-of-sina-weibo-api-gateway-based-on-apache-apisix
entry.summary: Sina Weibo’s previous HTTP API gateway was built based on Nginx, which brought up a series of problems. After some research, we chose Apache APISIX, which is dynamic, efficient and stable to meet the fast response requirements of the business.

entry.title: Apache APISIX has over 200 contributors in GitHub main repo!
entry.id: Apache APISIX has over 200 contributors in GitHub main repo!
entry.summary: Apache APISIX has over 200 contributors in GitHub main repo!

entry.title: Does etcd 3 Support HTTP Access Perfectly?
entry.id: 2021/06/30/etcd3-support-http-access-perfectly
entry.summary: It has been 8 months since the release of Apache APISIX version 2.0 last October. In the course of practice, we have also discovered some issues with etcd's HTTP API that interoperate with the gRPC API. In fact, having a gRPC-gateway does not mean that HTTP access is perfectly supported, there are some nuances here.

entry.title: Release Apache APISIX 2.7.0
entry.id: Release Apache APISIX 2.7.0
entry.summary: Apache APISIX 2.7.0 has been released!

entry.title: Why do you need Apache APISIX when you have NGINX and Kong?
entry.id: 2021/06/28/why-we-need-apache-apisix
entry.summary: This article describes the history of the open source API Gateway Apache APISIX architecture's evolution and compares the advantages of the two frameworks, Apache APISIX and Nginx.

entry.title: Deploy APISIX and APISIX Ingress Controller on Rancher
entry.id: Deploy APISIX and APISIX Ingress Controller on Rancher
entry.summary: This article shows the procedure of installing and deploying Apache APISIX and Apache APISIX Ingress Controller in the Rancher App Store (Catalog), and how to proxy Kubernetes services through them.

entry.title: How to Write an Apache APISIX Plugin in Java
entry.id: 2021/06/21/use-java-to-write-apache-apisix-plugins
entry.summary: Apache APISIX now supports writing plugins in Java! You can now write plugins in a programming language you are familiar with.

entry.title: APISIX Ingress Controller 1.0 Release
entry.id: 2021/06/18/first-ga-version-v1.0-of-apache-apisix-ingress-controller-released
entry.summary: Apache APISIX Ingress Controller v1.0 has been released, supporting the use of custom resources including ApisixRoute and ApisixUpstream, as well as Kubernetes native Ingress resources to control external traffic access to services deployed in Kubernetes.

entry.title: APISIX Dashboard Access Control Bypass Vulnerability Advisory (CVE-2021-33190)
entry.id: 2021/06/17/apache-apisix-dashboard-access-control-bypass-vulnerability-announcement
entry.summary: Apache APISIX Dashboard Access Control Bypass Vulnerability Bulletin

entry.title: Chaos Mesh Helps Apache APISIX Improve Stability
entry.id: 2021/06/16/chaos-mesh-helps-apache-apisix-improve-stability
entry.summary: This article describes how to use Chaos Mesh in a variety of scenarios to improve stability for Apache APISIX.

entry.title: Apache APISIX v.s Envoy: Which Has the Better Performance?
entry.id: 2021/06/10/apache-apisix-and-envoy-performance-comparison
entry.summary: This article introduces the performance comparison between Apache APISIX and Envoy under certain conditions. In general, APISIX is slightly better than Envoy in terms of response latency and QPS, and APISIX has more advantages than Enovy when multiple worker processes are enabled due to the collaborative approach of NGINX in high concurrency scenarios. The performance and latency of APISIX makes it a massive throughput capability in handling north-south traffic.

entry.title: Apache APISIX not affected by NGINX CVE-2021-23017
entry.id: 2021/06/07/apache-apisix-not-affected-by-nginx-cve-2021-23017
entry.summary: On May 26, NGINX issued a security announcement that fixed a DNS resolver vulnerability (CVE -2021-23017) in the NGINX resolver.

entry.title: Apache APISIX Open Source 2 Year Anniversary!
entry.id: Apache APISIX Open Source 2 Year Anniversary!
entry.summary: Apache APISIX is now two years old, thanks for all contributors.

entry.title: First Experience with Apache APISIX Shared by Student in OSPP 2020
entry.id: /blog/2021/06/03/firsthand-experience-with-apache-apisix-from-ospp-2020-students
entry.summary: In this interview, we invited two Apache APISIX committers to share their experience with Apache APISIX in the Summer 2020 of Open Source Promotion Plan.

entry.title: Apache APISIX Release 2.6.0
entry.id: 2021/05/25/apache-apisix-2.6.0-release
entry.summary: Apache APISIX 2.6.0-Release is officially released! You are welcome to download and use it.

entry.title: API Gateway Practice in Tencent with APISIX
entry.id: 2021/05/24/tencent-games
entry.summary: This article is a lecture note from the speech given by Xin Xu, an engineer in charge of internal container platform of Tencent Games, at the Apache APISIX Meetup - Shenzhen. By reading this article, you can not only learn what a gateway is and how the gateway model improves the traditional service architecture, but also understand the reasons for the birth of Tencent OTeam and how Apache APISIX is implemented inside Tencent.

entry.title: Get Front-End Test Coverage with Cypress
entry.id: Get Front-End Test Coverage with Cypress
entry.summary: In the article "Stable Product Delivery with Cypress", we discussed why we chose Cypress as our E2E testing framework. After spending nearly two months refining the test cases, we needed test coverage to quantify whether the test coverage was sufficient.This article will describe how to get APISIX Dashboard front-end E2E coverage using Cypress.

entry.title: Install Apache APISIX from Helm Charts
entry.id: Install Apache APISIX from Helm Charts
entry.summary: A few days ago, Zhiliu Inc released an online Helm Charts repository. Users can easily install Apache APISIX, Apache apisix-dashboard and Apache apisix-ingress-controller from it (rather than cloning the corresponding project in advance).

entry.title: Stable Product Delivery with Cypress
entry.id: Stable Product Delivery with Cypress
entry.summary: This article explains how Yi Sun, GitHub ID [@LiteSun](https://github.com/LiteSun), Apache APISIX Committer from [API7.ai](https://www.apiseven.com/), implements stable product delivery with Cypress.

entry.title: Run Ingress APISIX on Amazon EKS
entry.id: Run Ingress APISIX on Amazon EKS
entry.summary: Amazon EKS provides flexibility to start, run, and scale Kubernetes applications in the AWS cloud or on-premises. This article explains how to run Ingress APISIX on it.This article explains how to run Ingress APISIX on Amazon EKS.

entry.title: Apache APISIX Contributor Interview | Pengcheng Wang, Senior Security Consultant, PricewaterhouseCoopers China Data Security & Privacy Team
entry.id: 2021/01/11/interview-apache-apisix-contributor-wang-pengcheng-senior-security-advisor-of-pwc-south-china-data-security-and-privacy-protection-team
entry.summary: Recently, Pengcheng Wang, a senior security consultant from PwC's South China Data Security and Privacy team, reported the first CVE for Apache APISIX to the National Information Security Vulnerability Sharing Platform (CNVD) and the Apache Software Foundation: Apache APISIX Admin API Default Token Vulnerability (CVE-2020- 13945). To thank Pengcheng for his contribution to the Apache APISIX community, we also conducted an interview with Pengcheng.

entry.title: A First Look at Kubernetes Service APIs
entry.id: A First Look at Kubernetes Service APIs
entry.summary: This article provides a basic introduction to the Kubernetes Service APIs by asking questions. As a whole, the Kubernetes Service APIs refine many ingress best practices, such as the enhanced expressiveness, which actually extends the capabilities of Route, and the BackendPolicy objects, which can specify almost any Kubernetes backend resource for upstream.

entry.title: Envoy and Apache APISIX: Another way to implement the Envoy filter
entry.id: Envoy and Apache APISIX: Another way to implement the Envoy filter
entry.summary: Envoy is an L7 proxy and communication bus designed for large modern service oriented architectures. A pluggable filter chain mechanism allows filters to be written to perform different tasks and inserted into the main server.

entry.title: Ke Holdings Inc chooses Apache APISIX as API Gateway
entry.id: Ke Holdings Inc chooses Apache APISIX as API Gateway
entry.summary: Beike uses Apache APISIX as the API gateway of the production system, processing over 100 million production traffic every day, with excellent performance and stability. It happens that Apache APISIX has just joined the Apache incubator. In addition to congratulations, I would like to share why I chose Apache APISIX in the first place and some experiences in the process of using it.
